Desc.eng: Someone cracked an old magic mirror by mistake at the Bazaar. It came to life and started calling itself the Wretched One. The mirror creates evil duplicates of anyone who steps in front of it.
So that's where all these lunatics are coming from.
That is all I know. The mirror is protected by her creations in the living quarters.
I'll put an end to this madness once and for all.
I saved your life, but I will not investigate further.
